title: Add Product Notification
description: Create a new product notification, which sends an email to a user when the specified product comes back in stock.

expiryDate.description: The date on which the notification should expire.

productId.description: The ID of the product the notification is being created for.

profileId.description: The profile ID for the user to be notified.

siteId.description: The ID of the site the notification is being sent from.

skuId.description: The ID of the SKU the notification is being created for.

email.description: The email address to send the notification to.
